item.description:
Special Guests:
Candidate for Governor: John Robitaille (R)
Candidate for Secretary of State:
RI Senator Lou Raptakis (D)

We will be discussing our ongoing activities and the 2010 Tax Day Tea Party.

Our guests will introduce themselves and answer a few questions.

The meeting will run approximately one hour, followed by a social and volunteer/activities sign-up.


WB Cody's offers a great menu and full bar, we encourage you to support a business that supports
the Tea Party.
item.name: Winter Meeting of the Westerly Tea Party
